channel.title: Date joined rank
channel.description:
I think us who have joined in 07 should get some kind of rank for our no lifeness to still be here.
/discuss

item.title: Date joined rank
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

No? It takes nothing to register and come back after 5 years, but staying active throughout those 5 years is what ‘no lifeness’ would be. That’s what the post based ranks are for. Then if you prove to be a contributive member of Moparscape, you may get voted in for the veteran rank. (Cannot be obtained any other way other than getting voted in, so don’t ask)

Read full topic
